abstract: A majority of investors have rejected a plan to spin off Steel Partners II Master Fund, but the vote probably won’t stop Warren Lichtenstein, the New York hedge fund manager, from pressing ahead with the plan, The New York Post reported.
snippet: A majority of investors have rejected a plan to spin off Steel Partners II Master Fund, but the vote probably won’t stop Warren Lichtenstein, the New York hedge fund manager, from pressing ahead with the plan, The New York Post reported.
lead_paragraph: Warren Lichtenstein’s proposal to spin off his flagship hedge fund, Steel Partners II Master Fund, failed to win support from a majority of his firm’s investors, The New York Post reported, citing undisclosed sources.

headline.main: Steel Partners Spinoff Gets Cool Response, Report Says
